title: Mad Games Tycoon v0.150813A
description:
BUILD UP YOUR OWN GAMES EMPIRE

Form your own game studio in the early 80s in a small garage.
Develop your own game concepts, create a team and develop million-selling video games.
Research new technologies, train your staff and buy larger office buildings.
Expand your business and dominate the world's market for video games!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Establish a video game company
In Mad Games Tycoon you establish an Video Game Company in the early 80s.
You start in small garage with a small amount of money and limited resources.
Build your own office, hire a few employees and start to rule the entire industry.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Develop the games of your dreams
You have a lot of liberties to develop the game of your dreams.
Develop or buy a cheap Game-Engine and create a simple Platformer or the next 
big MMORPG. You can set your main focus on graphic, sound, technique and gameplay.
Choose between core and casualgamer as the targeted audience for your game.
Should your game have a Copy Protection? You wanna use an offical Movie License for your game?
This only a few possibilities to develop your own groundbreaking, best selling game.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Build your office from scratch
You can arrange your office by your own immagination.
Build development-, server-, or production rooms and your own executive office.
Place some desks, cabinets and plants how you will like it.
There are a lot of objects and rooms to arrange and individual and effective office
